item.title: pgvins
item.description: WIP Rebuilding the pgvins website into a fully fledged e-commerce with a newsletter and an admin dashboard. You can follow the development on the public repo, and look at the design system below. Team Development Massimo Meert Sylvain Bouillon Design Hatguina Fu

item.title: akrenovation
item.description: Desktop app for akrenovation, used for house analysis and quick invoice generation. This app was made for one of my client and is therefore private, but if you want to have a peek at it feel free to contact me!

item.title: blog test 1
item.description: Lesson 2 ÏûàÎã§: To have This usage of ÏûàÎã§ in Korean is an adjective. Sentences with adjectives cannot act on objects, thus you cannot have a word with the particle ~ÏùÑ/Î•º attached to it if the predicating word in a sentence is an adjective. To get around this, we can attach ~Ïù¥/Í∞Ä to the object instead in sentences with ÏûàÎã§. To indicate the thing that a person ‚Äúhas‚Äù in sentences with ÏûàÎã§.

item.title: guessera
item.description: A interactive 3D geography game for kids to have fun while learning countries. Built for a hackaton with Cyrus. Read more about it here.

item.title: chishiki
item.description: Chishiki is an API for building tools for learning Japanese. It provides easy access to a complete and modern database of Kanjis with all the information needed to learn them: readings, strokes, radicals, JLPT levels and more! Oh, and there is also a discord bot built around it! Example GET [url]/kanjis/kaze { "kanji": "È¢®", "meanings": ["wind", "air", "style", "manner"], "kun": ["„Åã„Åú", "„Åã„Åñ-"], "on": ["„Éï„Ç¶", "„Éï"], "grade": 2, "JLPT": "N4", "strokes": "9", "parts": ["„Éé", "Âá†", "Ëô´", "È¢®"], "radical": "È¢®", "usage": "558/2500", "stroke_order": "example.

item.title: lfm-go
item.description: lfm-go is a wrapper around the last.fm API for the golang programming language. It features structs for every requests response and allows you to easily plug in your API key. Note This package is now deprecated, the last.fm API is a nightmare to work with so I will not maintain it anymore.

item.title: elle-et-moi
item.description: elle-et-moi is an inventory management software built for the eponymous clothes store. Some of the interesting features implemented: QR code scanning, product trend reporting, low stock notifications, profit and loss reporting. This app was made for one of my client and is therefore private, but if you want to have a peek at it feel free to contact me!

item.title: About
item.description: About me Hello! I’m Massimo, a CS student from Belgium üáßüá™. I love backend development, devops, and have an interest in databases and cloud computing. Freelancing I’m a full-stack developer in my free-time, check out some of my projects in the next tab (repos might not be available yet). If you want to work together or hire me, feel free to contact me at pro@masmeert.com !
